creator: elvo@virgilio.it
text:
around the ssl_engine_pphrase.c line 750:
when only a line feed ('\n') is parsed, an error messagge is printed out but 
the 'Enter pass phrase:' prompt isn't reprinted so this can be so confusing.

A fix has been committed which should be included in a future release. Please
see revision 1.36 of ssl_engine_pphrase.c
creator: rederpj@apache.org
